ii2030 | Berlin | Oct 18 - 19, 2017
  • agenda
  • tracks

Innovating for a more inclusive 2030

Inclusive Innovation Tour & Factory

An Endeva initiative

Oct 18 - 19, 2017
Berlin, Germany

Conference Overview

ii2030 will bring together innovators from corporates to create solutions for a more inclusive society by 2030

Over two exciting days, participants from every sector will connect, collaborate and construct new ideas.

Agenda

Inclusive Innovation Tour

OCT 19, 2017 — ALL AROUND BERLIN

Several tour guides will take participants on an exploration of Berlin’s buzzing inclusive innovation scene to provide inspiration and information around the ii2030 challenges.

Tracks

The interactive, by-invitation-only event will employ technology as the engine to manufacture solutions for tomorrow’s biggest challenges.

How can we

deliver basic goods and services to remote areas using drones?

How can we

increase smallholder yields through remote sensing?

How can we

source data on low-income markets through artificial intelligence?

How can we

localize manufacturing in Africa with 3D printing?

How can we

improve remote diagnosis through image recognition?

Partners

An Endeva Initiative

ii2030

Oct 18 - 19, 2017

Berlin, Germany
